Summary: Driving near Paris Ontario on the hwy on Christmas 1972. Pulled off highway beacause we thought we saw a fire. Went to investigate and saw a bright cylindrical white object. It was 25 ft wide and hovering over some cows. Had a bubble around them.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Brant
There was one other sighting in Brant on or around December 25th 1972
divs: Sighting DetailsWill edit soon. Report taken over telephone.
